entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few flurries. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
